oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension certificate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pension certificate for Pvt. Elliott H. Boyd, Pvt. Co. G, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. Boyd enlisted in Pikeville, Tennessee on February 20, 1865 and listed his occupatioin as a farmer. The 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA served mainly in North Georgia against the guerrilla band under John P. Gatewood.
